replies.msg:
Salvio or Mercado, the only doubt

Higuaín won the fight to Agüero and will be from the start in the match against Nigeria. It remains to define who will occupy the right side of the defense.

The Argentine national team made his last practice before traveling to St. Petersburg, where tomorrow he will face Nigeria in search of a victory that will allow him to dream of qualifying for the second round of the World Cup in Russia.
In this training several doubts were cleared but one remained unresolved: who will occupy the right side of the defense? The two candidates are Eduardo Salvio and Gabriel Mercado.

The last line will again be formed by four players, of which there are three that are already defined. Marcos Rojo will recover his place after going to the bench against Croatia. The other two will be Nicolás Otamendi and Nicolás Tagliafico.

On the other hand, Gonzalo Higuaín will have his chance from the start by Sergio Agüero (holder against Iceland and Croatia) and will be part of the offensive along with Lionel Messi and Ángel Di María
In the midfield Javier Mascherano, Enzo Pérez and Ever Banega will play, and in the arc Franco Armani will enter by Wilfredo Caballero. The bet for the game tomorrow, it is clear, is to use mostly the "historical" players of the Albiceleste.

Rojo and Higuaín inside, Enzo Pérez as the only doubt
Rojo will return to the defense in place of Salvio, who would be out of the starting line against Nigeria, and Pipa (Higuain) won the post to Agüero. Mercado will be at the right side and the uncertainty goes to Perez, who is not 100% from the physical and could start at the bench.

With greater certainty, the Argentine selected his last practice before traveling to St. Petersburg, where tomorrow he will face Nigeria in search of a victory that will allow him to dream of qualifying to the second round of the World Cup in Russia.

In this training several doubts were cleared. Gabriel Mercado occupied the right side of the defense and Marcos Rojo joined the central back with Nicolás Otamendi, as against Iceland, displacing Eduardo Salvio from the starting lineup. With these developments, the last line will be formed by four players. Nicolás Tagliafico will continue on the left side.

In the midfield Javier Mascherano will play as central midfielder, with Ángel Di María at his right, Enzo Pérez on his left and Ever Banega looser and as partner of Lionel Messi, who will be accompanied by Gonzalo Higuain. El Pipa will have his chance from the start by Sergio Agüero (holder against Iceland and Croatia).

However, the Mendoza midfielder (Perez) did not show fullness in his physical condition during the last test and will be evaluated until the end. It is not ruled out that he can start among the substitutes and be replaced by Lucas Biglia in that sector of the field. Franco Armani will take the place of Wilfredo Caballero.

Salvio or Mercado, the only doubt

Higuaín won the fight to Agüero and will be from the start in the match against Nigeria. It remains to define who will occupy the right side of the defense.

The Argentine national team made his last practice before traveling to St. Petersburg, where tomorrow he will face Nigeria in search of a victory that will allow him to dream of qualifying for the second round of the World Cup in Russia.
In this training several doubts were cleared but one remained unresolved: who will occupy the right side of the defense? The two candidates are Eduardo Salvio and Gabriel Mercado.

The last line will again be formed by four players, of which there are three that are already defined. Marcos Rojo will recover his place after going to the bench against Croatia. The other two will be Nicolás Otamendi and Nicolás Tagliafico.

On the other hand, Gonzalo Higuaín will have his chance from the start by Sergio Agüero (holder against Iceland and Croatia) and will be part of the offensive along with Lionel Messi and Ángel Di María
In the midfield Javier Mascherano, Enzo Pérez and Ever Banega will play, and in the arc Franco Armani will enter by Wilfredo Caballero. The bet for the game tomorrow, it is clear, is to use mostly the "historical" players of the Albiceleste.
